channel.title: Will Give Rep++! HELP! Hybrid Pvp V3 Client help!
channel.description: im trying to make an owner crown, Only for owner, cuz you know how normally the gold crown is for admin and owner? i need just for owner. Can Someone pleaseee help me?

item.title: Will Give Rep++! HELP! Hybrid Pvp V3 Client help!
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

Native^:

Add with Tom’s cache suite, the new crown into the cache. And let the client reads it. Then modify the player status packet, by adding a new player state. 0 = normal player, 1 = pmod, 2 = admin, and you add 3 = owner. Then server sided, you give yourself playerstate 3.

forgot completely about toms cache editor as it doesn’t work for my cache :S

Read full topic

Add with Tom’s cache suite, the new crown into the cache. And let the client reads it. Then modify the player status packet, by adding a new player state. 0 = normal player, 1 = pmod, 2 = admin, and you add 3 = owner. Then server sided, you give yourself playerstate 3.

item.source: Will Give Rep++! HELP! Hybrid Pvp V3 Client help!

item.title: Will Give Rep++! HELP! Hybrid Pvp V3 Client help!
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

yes im assuming the client has a cache? if so go to your computer (c:) drive and find the cache if its not there then its just inside your client.

locate the sprites folder.

in my cache theres a folder called player inside there is where you will find icons and such create one and place it in that folder (same size and background colour is a must.)

then inside your client go to client.java and search for what ever the admin crown or somthing was named in your cache eg i would search for MODICONS

then replace the owner one with the name of your image and compile and run.

works with mine should hopefully work with yours ;3

Read full topic
item.source: Will Give Rep++! HELP! Hybrid Pvp V3 Client help!
